ygData.subject: RE: Ability Scores
ygData.msgSnippet: my troll has 82 base int...100+ when i train skills. just cast cold - disease over and over again...alternating between both will give the fastest progress.
ygData.messageBody:
my troll has 82 base int...100+ when i train skills.

just cast cold -> disease over and over again...alternating between both
will give the fastest progress.

kg


>From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Ability Scores
>Date: Fri, 5 Nov 1999 15:21:07 -0800
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Rich Hitz [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
>Sent: November 5, 1999 1:21 PM
>To: (Shadowknight)
>Subject: [shadowknight] Ability Scores
>
>
>From: Rich Hitz <rich.hitz@...>
>
>Abjuration!
>
>Ok, maybe I goofed on this one, but can anyone tell me the fastest way to
>increase Abjuration? I spent 20 minutes last night casting Prot. vs. Cold
>on
>myself and everyone that came into the Neriak bank last night and I only
>increased the skill by maybe 4 points.
>My Trolls Int is a 65 (that is with holding the Grobb Cleaver!). Would you
>suggest spending training points in it or waiting to train other skill like
>Parry next level and Double Attack at 20th?
>
>What you were doing works, your int is just unspeakably low and that'll
>slow
>it the hell down.
>My DE gained (around this, I'm not 100% sure) the first 20 points on the
>first 25 or so casts.
>
>I feel sorry for you when the time comes to train evoke for your ward
>spells
>at 22 =)
>
>
